sourceText: It is fine to say “We don’t know, but we are working on it; or we don’t know, ‘but we think’.”
text: Sa bon pou w di “Nou pa konnen, men nap travay sou sa; oswa nou pa konnen, ‘men nou panse’.”

sourceText: Use this as an opportunity to learn something new with your child!
text: Sèvi ak posiblite sa pou w aprann yon nouvo bagay ak pitit ou!

sourceText: Allow your child to talk freely. Ask them open questions and find out how much they already know.
text: Pèmèt pitit ou pale san l pa pè di sa l panse. Poze yo kesyon ouvè epi chache konnen ki kantite bagay yo konnen deja.

sourceText: Always answer their questions truthfully. Think about how old your child is and how much they can understand.
text: Toujou di yo laverite lè w ap reponn kesyon yo. Reflechi sou ki laj pitit ou ak ki kantite bagay yo ka konprann.

sourceText: Be open and listen.
text: Se pou w abòdab epi se pou w koute.

sourceText: Be honest.
text: Se pou w onèt

sourceText: Be supportive.
text: Se pou w ede yo.

sourceText: It is OK not to know the answers.
text: Se pa yon mal ditou si w pa konn repons kesyon yo.

sourceText: There are a lot of stories going around
text: Gen yon pakèt istwa kap sikile

sourceText: Some may not be true. Use trustworthy sites:https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-publicandhttps://www.unicef.org/coronavirus/covid-19from WHO and UNICEF.
text: Gen kèk ki ka pa vre. Sèvi ak sit moun fè konfyans:https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-publicandhttps://www.unicef.org/coronavirus/covid-19se sit WHO ak UNICEF.

sourceText: Check to see if your child is okay. Remind them that you care and that they can talk to you anytime. Then do something fun together!
text: Verifye si pitit ou anfòm. Fè yo sonje ou gen sousi pou yo epi yo ka pale avè w nenpòt ki lè. Apre sa fè yon bagay ki gen plezi ansanm!

sourceText: End on a good note.
text: Fini ak yon pawòl pozitif.

sourceText: Talking about COVID-19
text: Pale konsènan COVID-19

sourceText: Covid-19 Parenting
text: Edikasyon timoun nan peryòd Covid-19

sourceText: Be willing to talk. They will already have heard something. Silence and secrets do not protect our children.
text: Se pou w dispoze pou w pale. Y ap deja tande yon bagay sou sa. Rete san w pa di anyen oswa kenbe enfòmasyon yo sekrè pap pwoteje pitit nou yo.

sourceText: Honesty and openness do. Think about how much they will understand.
text: Se pou w onèt epi klè. Reflechi sou ki kantite y ap konprann.

sourceText: You know them best.
text: Ou pi byen konnen yo.

sourceText: Your child may be scared or confused.
text: Pitit ou a ka pè oswa li ka nan konfizyon.

sourceText: Give them space to share how they are feeling and let them know you are there for them.
text: Ba yo espas pou yo pataje avè w jan yo santi yo epi fè yo konnen ou la pou yo.

sourceText: Parenting tips from WHO
text: Konsèy ki soti nan WHO pou paran

sourceText: Parenting tips from UNICEF
text: Konsèy ki soti nan UNICEF pou paran

sourceText: In worldwide languages
text: Nan tout kalite lang yo pale nan mond lan

sourceText: evidence-base
text: baze sou bonjan prèv

sourceText: For more information click below links:
text: Pou jwenn plis enfòmasyon klike sou lyen ki pi ba yo:

sourceText: Heroes not bullies.
text: Se pou w yon ewo, men pa yon moun k ap domine.

sourceText: Explain that COVID-19 has nothing to do with the way someone looks, where they are from, or what language they speak.
text: Esplike yo COVID-19 pa gen anyen pou l wè ak aparans yon moun, kote yo soti, oswa lang yo pale.

sourceText: Tell your child that we can be compassionate to people who are sick and those who are caring for them.
text: Di pitit ou yo ka montre yo gen kè sansib pou moun ki malad ak moun kap pran swen moun sa yo.

sourceText: Look for stories of people who are working to stop the outbreak and are caring for sick people.
text: Chèche istwa moun k ap travay pou mete fen nan epidemi an ak moun k ap pran swen moun ki malad.

sourceText: Partners
text: Patnè yo

sourceText: Funders
text: Moun ki finanse yo
